text: 'iinama haram allah ealaykum ma yadurukum kalmytt alty lm tdhbh bitariqat shreyt, waldam almsfwh, walahm alkhnzyr, waldhbayh alty dhbht lighayr allh. wmin fadl allah ealaykum wtysyrh 'anah abah lakum 'akl hadhih almhrmat eind aldrwr. faman aljath aldarurat 'iilaa 'akl shay' mnha, ghyr zalim fi 'akalah fawq hajth, wala mtjawz hudud allah fima 'ubyh lh, fala dhanb ealayh fi dhalik. 'iina allah ghafur lebadh, rahim bhm
